question: Which genes predict resistance to Regorafenib Anhydrous in Colorectal Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Regorafenib Anhydrous')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Regorafenib Anhydrous'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Regorafenib Anhydrous')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Doxorubicin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Doxorubicin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Doxorubicin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'glandular' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pattern' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'yolk' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sac' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes confer resistance to Vismodegib in Basal Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vismodegib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vismodegib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vismodegib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'basal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Not Applicable')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'with' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'etv6-runx1'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,

  disease_name,
  pmids

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastric' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Afatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,

  pmids

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cetuximab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cetuximab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cetuximab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cecum' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Osimertinib in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer?
cypher:

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Osimertinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Osimertinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Osimertinib')
)

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'anaplastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'large' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Venetoclax in Follicular Lymphoma?

question: Which genes predict resistance to Tisagenlecleucel in B Lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Tisagenlecleucel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tisagenlecleucel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tisagenlecleucel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Radiation Therapy in Head And Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Radiation Therapy')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Radiation Therapy'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Radiation Therapy')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gefitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gefitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p

RETURN

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,

  disease_name,

LIMIT 100

question: Which genes confer resistance to Capivasertib in Tumor Of The Prostate?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Capivasertib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Capivasertib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Capivasertib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'prostate'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Ridaforolimus in Neoplasm Of Endometrium?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ridaforolimus')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ridaforolimus'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ridaforolimus')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'endometrial'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lapatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'her2-receptor' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'positive' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'skin' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'thyroid' AND

  )

WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Venetoclax')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Venetoclax'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Venetoclax')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphocytic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,

  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,

WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cabozantinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cabozantinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cabozantinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,

question: List genes associated with resistance to Paclitaxel in Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma.
cypher:

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Paclitaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Paclitaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Paclitaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids

UNWIND pmids AS p

RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Lorlatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lorlatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lorlatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p

RETURN

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pexidartinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pexidartinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes confer resistance to Anthracycline Antineoplastic Antibiotic in Acute Promyelocytic Leukemia?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Anthracycline Antineoplastic Antibiotic')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Anthracycline Antineoplastic Antibiotic'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Anthracycline Antineoplastic Antibiotic')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'promyelocytic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Venetoclax')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Venetoclax'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Venetoclax')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Doxorubicin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphocytic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Brigatinib in Primary Cancer?
cypher:

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Brigatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Brigatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Brigatinib')
)
